p: In the cAMP estimation assay of TS Oil, the cAMP levels measured in the untreated tracheal tissues (vehicle control) were 89.65 ± 0.745 pmol of cAMP/mg protein of tissue homogenate while in pre-incubated tissues with 0.3 and 1 mg/ml of TS Oil, the cAMP levels measured were 97.02 ± 1.459 ( p < 0.05) and 105.42 ± 2.390 ( p < 0.01) pmol/mg protein, respectively, ( Figure 6A). The positive control (papaverine) pre-incubation with 1 and 3 µM increased the cAMP levels to 97.9 3 ± 1.365 pmol/mg protein ( p < 0.05) and 104.43 ± 2.078 ( p < 0.01) pmol/mg protein, respectively, ( Figure 6B).
